p: Subtyping real-time RT-PCR revealed that 110 samples were B/Victoria and 98 were B/Yamagata lineage, respectively, to identify the lineage of the 217 influenza B viruses circulating in Uruguay during 2012â€“2019. The remaining nine samples could not be subtyped. Forty-one samples were randomly selected from 208 influenza B virus for further HA and NA genetic analyses.
